introduction: I’m Prashant, a Computer Science student entering my final year at Dr. Subhash Technical Campus. My passion? Web development. From the intricate dance of JavaScript and React to the structure of HTML, the styling finesse of CSS and Tailwind CSS, I love bringing digital visions to life.

I thrive in team settings, where collaboration ignites creativity. With Git as our trusty guide, we navigate the complexities of version control seamlessly. And I’m always learning – staying ahead of the curve with the latest industry trends keeps me sharp and ready to tackle new challenges.
Let’s connect and explore the possibilities. Together, we can craft something truly remarkable in the digital landscape.
